answers.author: Francine Burge
answers.text:
The only benefit to TM is that they are a national system and "could" reach people coming from out of town. Their contracts are very restrictive and they are expensive with the largest fees for customers. Thank goodness with technology boom, they are not the monopoly as they once were. If you're venue is relatively easy with General Admission only (no tiered pricing or subscriptions) I'd check out Ticket Fly or Eventive. Good Luck!
